text.name: Mask of the Desert King
text.description:
{Mask of the Desert King}

Worn on the head, this item increases your Knowledge skill by +4, and increases the chance wandering creatures will offer to join the heroâ€™s army.
text.event: In the ruins of an ancient city, you find a worn mask. As you put it on, vistas of past empires flash in your mind and you hear a voice 'Every kingdom falls. Maybe you will be the one'.
